s.text: There is a disquieting dialogue at work here, the play of color capturing the tensions of the chrysalis.

Never Easy , the second, reverses field and feel with a talking head who, while almost didactic in her delivery of a simple message and a not-so-subtle push for ABC itself, is young enough, earnest enough, to strike a chord across her audience.

The other message, of course, is that ABC is au courant with the role of family values in politics today, and that it cares enough to turn over prime time to the anti-drug campaign.
